DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present study is to evaluate the validity of 2 objective measures of physical activity among older adults. In addition, the investigators will examine the influence of functionality, walking aids, walking speed and step length on the accuracy.
DOC.brief_title: Objective Assessment of Physical Activity in Older Adults
DOC.criteria: > 70 years recent cardiovascular event vestibular disorder or fracture (4 months) severe dementia oxygen supplementation during daily activities not able to perform daily activities
